SHORT_DESCR.P: SmartNett Sør 2.0 is the company's competition outsourcing model for executing assignments (investments (re-investments and new investments), operation, maintenance, and contingency in the network.

The aim of the procurement is to ensure Agder Energi Nett AS stable and professional development, operational, and maintenance suppliers in the area. This is so that the company can run and develop its business in a cost efficient way that is in accordance with the regulatory framework that applies for the business. The delivery will also contribute to Agder Energi Net AS reaching its goals on good supply security, high final customer satisfaction and seeing to its social responsibility.

SmartNett Sør 2.0, purchase principle P1 covers services in operation, maintenance, contingency and re-investments / new investments for electrotechnical contractor work. The services to be delivered are product based and the tenderers compete for geographically defined purchasing areas in Agder. Relevant tenderers are asked to register in the Achilles UNCE qualification scheme. The following is required: (1) Registration of all the codes 4.2.16, 4.2.19, 4.2.20, 4.2.21, 4.9.1, 4.9.2, 4.9.3 and 4.9.4. (2) Delivered ESPD form and (3) Be a qualified supplier in Achilles UNCE in order to participate in the further prequalification. The qualification starts in Achilles UNCE on 18 October 2021 at 1400.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract will consist of a fixed period + several option periods.
Some services can also be option based.

SUITABILITY.P: Relevant tenderers are asked to register in the Achilles UNCE qualification scheme. The following is required: (1) Registration of all the codes 4.2.16, 4.2.19, 4.2.20, 4.2.21, 4.9.1, 4.9.2, 4.9.3 and 4.9.4. (2) Delivered ESPD form and (3) Be a qualified supplier in Achilles UNCE in order to participate in the further prequalification. The qualification starts in Achilles UNCE on 18 October 2021 at 1400.

INFO_ADD.P: An information meeting will be held on the procurement on Teams on Tuesday 05 October at 13:00. Register with your name, mobile number, and email address by Monday 04 October at 12 noon. Registration is to be sent to Jon Larsen-Frivoll.
